title: Best 750RP Skin and 520RP Skin?
body:
I have 1271RP right now and if I spend it on 520 and 750 I will have 1RP left over which I always wanted...

Suggestions?

replies.body:
You should wait til they go on sale, then you can get 4 skins. Or you can get 2 (better looking) 975 skins on sale and a 520 skin on sale. Have 36RP left.

520: Outback Renekton, Pharaoh Nasus, Prom Queen Annie, lil' slugger Trundle, Statue of Karthus, Gothic Orianna, Monarch Kogmaw, Myrmidon Pantheon, Sewn Chaos Orianna

750: Sweetheart Annie, Midnight Ahri, Junkyard Trundle, General Wukong, Constable Trundle, Goalkeeper Maokai, Superfan Gragas
I am the skin thrift shop king.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=E9XsdxBE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-01T06:40:10.748+0000)
>
> You should wait til they go on sale, then you can get 4 skins. Or you can get 2 (better looking) 975 skins on sale and a 520 skin on sale. Have 36RP left.
> 
> 520: Outback Renekton, Pharaoh Nasus, Prom Queen Annie, lil' slugger Trundle, Statue of Karthus, Gothic Orianna, Monarch Kogmaw, Myrmidon Pantheon, Sewn Chaos Orianna
> 
> 750: Sweetheart Annie, Midnight Ahri, Junkyard Trundle, General Wukong, Constable Trundle, Goalkeeper Maokai, Superfan Gragas

The point is to have 1RP left over though :P

520 - I don't have any interest in those champions other than Ori which I have the 2 best skins for her anyway
750 - Have no interest in any of them except Wukong in which I already have the General skin :P

But thanks for the effort anyway

marauder ashe/ww and warden naut/sivir are 750
bandito fid, chosen yi, commando j4, jack of hearts tf, pre void kass, prestigous lb, samurai yi, tundra ww, uncle ryze are all 520 and decent skins
acolyte lee, captain voli, fiddle me timbers, red card tf, pentakill karth, runeborn xerath, temple jax, tundra fizz, veigar breybeard, are all decent 750 rp skins
hope i helped
Uncle ryze is a pretty sweet skin I reckon.
All goods guys, thanks for the replies, I got Rugged Garen and Frosted Ezreal
